name: Saci e Curupira: Super Lendas
description: Saci e Curupira: Super Lendas is a platformer game with 10 short and challenging levels. The player can choose to play as Saci or Curupira and needs to defeat all lumberjacks to win each level. Before facing your enemies however, you need to recover Saci's magic beenie or Curupira's figthing boar, witch gives then back their fighting skills.
